name: LDJam_04-2022
description:
The big ADIOS Story

Death has come to earth. It's the job of the angels to delay the inevitable and save the humans from death as long as possible.

To do so the angels have three powers. The first power is the ability to create holy walls which cannot be passed by anyone. Not even death.

The second and third power are materialized in totems which will repel death and gather humans or the other way around.

HINT: The items can be selected using the keys 1-3 on your keyboard or by clicking on them.

Help to DELAY THE INEVITABLE!

Finally

It was a really fun jam. Hopefully all of you had as much fun as we did and you can now fully enjoy our game.

For best performance you should obviously download it but most of it should work fine in WebGL. (Except some weird audio bug in unity)

Leave a comment about things you like and/or dislike.

Looking forward to play y'all games as well :D.

## Credits
